column1: Sapanca is a town and district in the Sakarya Province in the Marmara region of Turkey near Lake Sapanca. The town's mayor is Özcan ÖZEN (AKP).
Sapanca has recently become a tourist destination
column2: due to its stunning natural environment and its lake
column4: as well as its proximity to İstanbul and the city of İzmit
column5: also known as Kocaeli. The town has a number of hotels and resorts.
